text.description:
The Best Restaurants in NYC You Must Try Get 50% off your first order of CookUnity meals â€” go to https://cookunity.com/brettconti and use my code BRETTCONTI50 at checkout to try them out for yourself! Thanks to CookUnity for sponsoring this video!" Subscriber for more videos @brettconti
Check out @AlexandraRobinson @GabrielDeSanti @NoelleCrooks
Subscribe to my Newsletter https://bit.ly/BrettNewsLetter
In today's vlog we explore NYC as I showcase some of my favorite restaurants here in the city in a day in the life style vlog.
0:00 Intro 0:20 Black Seed Bagel 2:07 Maman Cafe 4:28 Cook Unity 5:40 Bodhi Chinatown 8:08 Cafe Panna 10:26 Frank
My Camera: https://amzn.to/3B0sKBM Lens I Use: https://amzn.to/3yRYma9 Drone: https://amzn.to/3ISjmlz Music I use for all my videos. Sign up for a free Musicbed account to try for yourself https://bit.ly/3yV3uKv
text.fulltitle: The Best Restaurants in NYC You Must Try

best restaurants in New York City

and get your delicious New York Bagel
certified flavor bomb
